column2: an A.M. Eatery////I have eaten at Snooze several times and keep going back
column3: because I love it so much!  The staff is friendly and gives excellent service.  I love the healthy options
column4: too.  It's hard to pick a favorite
column5: everything I've eaten here is wonderful.  They use only fresh ingredients
column6: are socially conscience and give back to the communities around them.  Parking can be a pain at this location
column7: but it's definitely worth it!  Hands down
column8: this is one of my favorite places for brunch!
